days.label: Day 1 - Wed Oct 01 2025
days.text: Our story begins here — the first day of this little countdown to you ❤️

days.label: Day 2 - Thu Oct 02 2025
days.text: Every sunrise feels warmer knowing you exist ☀️

days.label: Day 3 - Fri Oct 03 2025
days.text: You make ordinary days feel magical ✨

days.label: Day 4 - Sat Oct 04 2025
days.text: A smile from you can change everything 💫

days.label: Day 5 - Sun Oct 05 2025
days.text: Our laughter is my favorite sound 🎶

days.label: Day 6 - Mon Oct 06 2025
days.text: Even distance bends before love 💌

days.label: Day 7 - Tue Oct 07 2025
days.text: You and me — that’s the definition of home 🏡

days.label: Day 8 - Wed Oct 08 2025
days.text: Your eyes hold every answer I ever needed 💖

days.label: Day 9 - Thu Oct 09 2025
days.text: If love were art, you’d be the masterpiece 🎨

days.label: Day 10 - Fri Oct 10 2025
days.text: Your presence feels like poetry 🌹

days.label: Day 11 - Sat Oct 11 2025
days.text: Every second with you is a heartbeat of joy 💓

days.label: Day 12 - Sun Oct 12 2025
days.text: Your name feels like home when I whisper it 💕

days.label: Day 13 - Mon Oct 13 2025
days.text: You light up my dull days with your magic ✨

days.label: Day 14 - Tue Oct 14 2025
days.text: No matter what, my heart finds you every time 💞

days.label: Day 15 - Wed Oct 15 2025
days.text: You’re the calm to my chaos 🌈

days.label: Day 16 - Thu Oct 16 2025
days.text: Your laugh is my favorite addiction 💗

days.label: Day 17 - Fri Oct 17 2025
days.text: In your arms, the world stops spinning 💫

days.label: Day 18 - Sat Oct 18 2025
days.text: Every heartbeat spells your name 💌

days.label: Day 19 - Sun Oct 19 2025
days.text: You are the softest part of my every story 🌷

days.label: Day 20 - Mon Oct 20 2025
days.text: You’re my peace after long days 🕊️

days.label: Day 21 - Tue Oct 21 2025
days.text: The way you care — it’s my forever favorite 💝

days.label: Day 22 - Wed Oct 22 2025
days.text: Your kindness is my daily reminder of love 🌸

days.label: Day 23 - Thu Oct 23 2025
days.text: Your smile makes the stars jealous ✨

days.label: Day 24 - Fri Oct 24 2025
days.text: You make me believe in perfect moments 💗

days.label: Day 25 - Sat Oct 25 2025
days.text: The world feels complete when you’re near 💞

days.label: Day 26 - Sun Oct 26 2025
days.text: Happy Birthday, my love 💖 You’re my forever reason to smile.
